name: bandapes (itch)
description:
🙈

a rhythmic battle game where you take position of a band leader and play the drums to guide your squad of apes to victory!

🙊

♪♪♪  each ape listens to different drum patterns ♪♪♪ 
so try looking out for patterns/apes that fit well together so you can quickly dish out the right commands.

🙉

you battle against the bands of other players, which are controlled by an AI that plays like the real player would (almost)!

🐒🐒🐒 there are 6 different apes each with a special move! 🐒🐒🐒

Controls

  • play with mouse
  • or, while in battle, play the drums with 1 - 4

Unique Selling Point

the apes can wear hats 👒🎩

Windows - Shader error? / only see a black screen / other graphical issues?

  • You probably don't have DirectX yet or you are missing a driver either way. You can download the necessary driver for free with this link: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?displaylang=en&id=35

Mac OS X - Unable to find game?

  • This is an issue we're having with OS X. Move the game to a different folder and then run the game again. This usually fixes it!
